recipes: Whenever the principle of the Heart is implicated, I may gain Vitality.
My own heart pumps more strongly, today.
Whenever the principle of the Lantern sheds its light, I may recall additional scraps of knowledge.
Dusty facts have come clear in my brain. For now, at least.
Moth finds the light in the dark, and so do I.
A half-glimpsed wistfulness has touched me.
Is there something to be learnt from the satisfaction of desire?
